attributes.action: Create laws for manufacturers to make adjustments to vehicle headlights
attributes.additional_details: Vehicle headlights should be placed at a specified height to prevent glare and reduced visibility for motorists. There should also be a section in the driving tests which teaches new drivers how to adjust their headlights to prevent blinding oncoming traffic.
attributes.background: Vehicle headlights have changed over the years. With the switch to LED headlights, modern headlights have become quite dangerous for other motorists. New regulations should be made to make driving easier and reduce dazzling especially in the winter months where visibility is reduced.

rejection.details:
Ban LED vehicle headlights or regulate bulb wattage
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744882
